comments.body: Seems we also have the same case class `FileSegment` in core/storage module. can we just use that one, or we have to build our own?
comments.diffHunk:

comments.body: Good point. But that FileSegment is for local files and uses java's File to store the file name. So can;t use that. And I did not want to change anything in core because of streaming.
